value.name: Haverhill police investigate Sunday night shooting
value.description: May 18—HAVERHILL — Police say no injuries were reported after a shooting Sunday night near the city's Lafayette Square section. Deputy Chief Stephen Doherty said a 911 call for shots fired came in at 9:26 p.m. and officers were dispatched to the area ...

value.name: May 18 police reports
value.description: —Keith Williams, 25, Hurlburt Field, Florida; rape, electronic solicitation of a child and traveling to meet a child for an unlawful sex act; in Morgan County Jail with bail set at $60,000. (Decatur police) —Jamie Christian, 64, Fulton, Mississippi ...
